content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (Position x=0.0-2.0, y=0.0)
Consists of two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Furnace 1 at Position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at Position(2.0, 0.0)
Both furnaces are producing iron plates from iron ore

### Copper Plate Production (Position x=4.0, y=4.0)
Single stone furnace producing copper plates from copper ore

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Complex assembly line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at Position(6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at Position(7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at Position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at Position(11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at Position(12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-28.5)
Complete power generation setup:
- Offshore pump at Position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting water flow
- Boiler at Position(-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at Position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Electrical distribution network with multiple electric poles

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to access non-existent lab
- Verify the lab entity exists at the specified position before attempting to access it
- Position(x=0.5, y=28.5) appears to be invalid for lab placement

### Resource shortage warnings in assembly
- Ensure consistent supply of required ingredients (iron plates and copper cables) to the assembling machine
- Consider improving the logistics to maintain steady material flow

### Inserter waiting for source items
- Ensure input chests are regularly stocked with required materials
- Verify the inserter pickup and drop positions are correctly configured
